Summary: To access NUS Guest WIFI, first connect to the NUS_Guest SSID and enter your mobile number. You will receive an OTP (One-Time-Pin) code and must agree to the Terms of Use. Once you enter the OTP and confirm, you will be successfully authenticated and have access to the WIFI for 24 hours. To access the Classroom PCs for EEP participants, use the provided credentials to login to the ISS Desktop PC.
